鋝字的基本解释

l<è

鋝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lüè］
［《廣韻》力輟切，入薛，來。］
“寽2”的今字。亦作“率3”。“锊1”的繁体字。
量词。一鋝重六两又大半两，二十两为三鋝。《周礼·考工记·冶氏》：“重三鋝。”郑玄注：“玄謂許叔重。《説文解字》云：'鋝，鍰也。'今東萊稱或以大半兩爲鈞，十鈞爲環，環重六兩大半兩。鍰鋝似同矣，則三鋝爲一斤四兩。”一说一鋝为六两，见清孙诒让正义。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lüè］
["Guangyun" forcefully stops cutting, enters Xue, come. ]
The present character of "寽2". Also called "rate 3". "锊1" in traditional characters.
quantifier. One tin weighs six taels and half two taels, and twenty taels is three tints. "Zhou Li·Kao Gong Ji·Ye Shi": "Chong San Tan." Zheng Xuan's note: "Xuan Ye Xu Shuzhong. "Shu Wen Jie Zi" says: "Tan, Yin Ye." Today Donglai said it might be half of the two as the junction. , Ten Jun is the ring, and the ring weighs six or two and half two. If the smelt is the same, then the three smelts are one catty and four liang.” When one said that one smelt is six liang, see Qing Sun Yirang justice.
